body_content.explanation: the very deep feeling of extreme anxiety and unhappiness that some people have when their body or other people's treatment of them does not match their gender identity and they wish it did:
examples: Studies have shown that transitioning can relieve gender dysphoria.
It took a team of medical professionals years to fully revise the criteria for diagnosing gender dysphoria.
They looked for a doctor who had experience with trans patients and gender dysphoria.
